title: Toys and materials from the future
description: The Inventables guys, Zach Kaplan and Keith Schacht, demo some amazing new materials and how we might use them. Look for squishy magnets, odor-detecting ink, "dry" liquid and a very surprising 10-foot pole.
author: Zach Kaplan + Keith Schacht
keywords: TED, talks, business, creativity, design, industrial design, invention, materials, science, smell, technology, toy
